ing: 1 cup diced ham, fat removed, or more to taste
1 cup chopped kale, or to taste
des: "I couldn't find a recipe with ham and white kidney beans, so I came up with this. Luckily, it came out exactly as I imagined. I simmered it all day, just because that's how I like to make my soup. But it was cooked within 30 minutes at a low boil, but had more flavor after a long simmer covered. I served with Italian 5-grain bread buttered and toasted."
ins: Combine chicken broth, kidney beans, parsnips, portobello mushrooms, onion, ham, carrots, celery, garlic, thyme, oregano, Sriracha sauce, and bay leaves in a 6-quart pot; bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 45 minutes. Add kale and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
